Trade/Device Name(s): Glooko Device System for the Glooko Logbook Application & Glooko Logbook Charts
Glooko Device System for Logbook Application & Glooko Logbook Charts
Glooko Device System for the Glooko Logbook Application and Glooko Logbook Charts
Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Glooko Device System—data management software and accessories for uploading and analyzing blood glucose data from meters to iOS devices.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in home and professional settings to aid individuals with diabetes and their healthcare professionals in review, analysis, and evaluation of blood glucose readings to support diabetes management; not for treatment decision use.
